thread.title: close to everything.
thread.title_full: close to everything. - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ksachtleben
title: close to everything.
text:
this location is close to everything by train or subway. 2 blocks from Penn station and tucked under the Empire State Building. most comfortable beds in New York. 1 subway stop from Times square and 2 block walk to Macys and Madison Square Garden. Very convenient location. Hotel includes free Breakfast. if you don't need the frills of a pretty view this hotel was very reasonable during a busy valentine's day weekend.
Room Tip: 5th floor room and I could not hear street noise like I have at other hotels higher up. See more room tips
